Package fr.umlv.splendor

Class ActionReader

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.splendor.ActionReader
public class ActionReader extends Object
This object read the actions of the player and executes them.

      Parameters:
      board - (Board) the board
      player - (Integer) number of the player
      choice - (String) the input of the player
      Returns:
